meta.title: Residential Window Cleaning in Saint-Lambert
meta.description: Professional window cleaning for a bright interior.

hero.title: Residential Window Cleaning in Saint-Lambert
hero.description: We offer window cleaning services for a bright and clean interior. Book now!

beforeAfter.title: Before and After
beforeAfter.description: See the difference our professional window cleaning can make.

features.title: Sparkling Windows, For You
features.description: Discover the benefits of choosing SuperVitre for top-quality residential and commercial window cleaning services.

professionalCleaning.title: Professional Cleaning
professionalCleaning.description: Our qualified technicians use professional techniques and equipment for an impeccable cleaning of your windows, frames, and screens.

streakFree.title: Streak-Free Results Guaranteed
streakFree.description: We use premium cleaning solutions and purified water to ensure perfectly transparent windows, without any streaks or residue.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly Products
ecoFriendly.description: We care about your environment. That's why we use biodegradable and environmentally friendly cleaning products.

safetyFirst.title: Safety and Reliability
safetyFirst.description: Our team is trained to work safely, adhering to the strictest standards, and we are fully insured for your peace of mind.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible and Convenient Hours
flexibleScheduling.description: We offer flexible time slots to fit your busy schedule, including evenings and weekends upon request.

satisfactionGuaranteed.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
satisfactionGuaranteed.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you are not completely satisfied, we promise to return and correct the situation.

howItWorks.title: Clean Windows in a Few Simple Steps
howItWorks.description: Discover how we make your windows spotless, quickly and efficiently.

step1.title: Book Your Service
step1.description: Choose a date and time that suits you via our simple online booking form or call us directly.

step2.title: Confirmation & Preparation
step2.description: We will confirm your appointment and give you some simple tips to prepare for our technicians' arrival.

step3.title: Enjoy Sparkling Windows
step3.description: Our experts clean your windows with care and professionalism, leaving you to enjoy a clear view and a brighter home.

testimonials.title: Loved by Teams Worldwide
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. See what our customers have to say about their experience.
testimonials.noFeedback: No testimonials to display at the moment.
testimonials.leaveReview: Had a good experience with us?

pricing.title: Simple and Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that brightens your everyday life.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: The essentials for clear windows and a welcoming home, ideal for regular maintenance.

pro.title: Standard
pro.description: Our most popular package for impeccable cleanliness, inside and out. Rediscover clarity!
features: Exterior and interior cleaning of all windows
Complete cleaning of frames and rails

enterprise.title: Premium
enterprise.description: The ultimate SuperVitre experience. Give your windows the royal treatment for unparalleled shine and protection.
features: Exterior and interior cleaning of all windows
Complete cleaning of frames and rails
Application of a special protective sealant to the windows

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your common questions about our window cleaning services.

questions.question: Which areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We primarily serve the Saint-Lambert region and its surroundings. You can check our service page or contact us directly to confirm if we cover your location.

questions.question: What happens in case of bad weather on the day of my appointment?
questions.answer: Safety is our priority. In case of heavy rain or dangerous weather conditions, we will contact you to reschedule your service to a later date that suits you, at no extra cost.

questions.question: Is cleaning of window frames and screens included?
questions.answer: Yes, our standard service includes cleaning of accessible windows, frames, and screens. More comprehensive services are available according to your needs.

questions.question: How can I pay for the service?
questions.answer: We accept cash or Interac e-Transfer payments once the service is completed to your satisfaction. No deposit is required for booking.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the cleaning?
questions.answer: Your satisfaction is our guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied with the result, please contact us within 24 hours, and we will return to correct the situation at no charge.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Windows?
finalCta.description: Join our many satisfied customers and enjoy sparkling clean windows that will brighten your daily life.
finalCta.footnote: Simple and quick booking. Satisfaction guaranteed.
finalCta.recaptchaNotice: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink> and <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> apply.

footer.about: SuperVitre offers professional window cleaning services for residences and businesses. Get a free quote today and let the light in!
